ref.mixed-citation: di Castri F (1989) History of biological invasions with special emphasis on the Old World. Pages 1–30 in J. R. Drake, H. A. Mooney, F. di Castri, R. Groves, F. J. Kruger, M. Rejmánek, and M. Williamson, eds. Biological invasions: a global perspective. John Wiley and Sons Press, Chichester.
